name: play
description: this will search the song name on youtube and play the first result. will automatically add to queue if its not the first song

name: pause
description: Will pause the song if currently playing

name: resume
description: Will resume the song if is currently paused

name: next
description: Will play the next song on the queue

name: queue
description: Will show all songs in the queue

name: current
description: Will show the song that is currently playing

name: loop
description: Will toggle the loop mode on queue

name: join
description: Bot will enter the voice channel that you are.

name: leave
description: Bot will leave the voice channel
